title: ASI Signs Contract for Lunar Robotic Mission Simulation and Control Centre
summary:
The Italian space agency ASI has signed a €3.5 million contract with ALTEC for the initial design and construction phase of the Centro di Simulazione e Controllo Missioni Robotiche Lunari (Lunar Robotic Mission Simulation and Control Center). Located at the ALTEC Turin Aerospace City facilities, the new control center will be completed in three years. […]
The post ASI Signs Contract for Lunar Robotic Mission Simulation and Control Centre appeared first on European Spaceflight.

title: Musk not eager to take Starlink public
summary: SpaceX Chief Executive Elon Musk again appeared to rule out any near-term plans for spinning out his company’s Starlink broadband satellite business and taking it public.

title: China launches new Beidou satellites, rocket booster lands near house
summary: China added a new pair of satellites to its Beidou positioning and navigation system late Monday, but spent stages from the launch landed within inhabited areas.

title: Japan’s SLIM successfully enters lunar orbit, gears up for precision moon landing
summary: Japan’s SLIM spacecraft entered lunar orbit Dec. 25, setting up a moon landing attempt scheduled for Jan. 19.
